title: [Health] Researchers reviewed almost 400 studies involving 164,000 people across the world using wearable activity trackers (WATs) to monitor their physical activity and found that WATs encourage people to walk up to 40 minutes (~1800 more steps) more each day

[Medicine] Restricting salt intake is considered a key component of heart failure treatment, but restricting it too much may actually worsen the outcomes for people with a common form of the conditions. Younger people and those of black and other ethnicities seem to be most at risk, the findings indicate.
